Mazen Alotaibi is an engineer, researcher, and thinker. He graduated from Oregon State Univesity with a BS degree in Computer Science Applied in Artificial Intelligence; with a minor in Actuarial Science.

Most recently, he worked at the Center for Genome Research & Bio-computing as a Lead GPU Computational Researcher. He is the President of OSU AI Club. He works on projects on GitHub and participates in Kaggle competitions to distract him from academic life. You could contact me.
